sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Row style="padding-top: 20px;background: #fff;">
    <Col span="22" offset="1">
      <!--      {{formItem}}-->
      <!--      {{nextNodeIdStr}}-->
      <Form class="ui-combination-form" ref="formItem" :model="formItem" :rules="formItemValidate" :label-width="120">
        <FormItem label="节点号" prop="id">
          <Input v-model="formItem.id" placeholder="请输入..." disabled></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="节点名称" prop="name">
          <Input v-model="formItem.name" placeholder="请输入..."></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="黑名单组" prop="nextNodeId">
          <Select v-model="formItem.blackGroupId">
            <Option :value="item.id" v-for="(item,i) in blackListGroups" :key="i">{{item.name}}</Option>
          </Select>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="黑名单跳转节点" prop="inBlacklistNextNodeId">
          <Select v-model="formItem.inBlacklistNextNodeId">
            <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in nextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>
          </Select>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="非黑名单跳转节点" prop="notInBlacklistNextNodeId">
          <Select v-model="formItem.notInBlacklistNextNodeId">
            <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in nextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>
          </Select>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="说明" prop="describe">
          <Input type="textarea" v-model="formItem.describe" placeholder="请输入..."></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem>
          <Button @click="btnOk" type="primary">确定</Button>
          <Button @click="btnCancel" style="margin-left: 8px">取消</Button>
        </FormItem>
      </Form>
    </Col>
  </Row>
</template>

<script>
import {getBlackListGroups} from "@/api/index";
import voiceManage from "@/views/sys/voice-manage/voiceManage";
var frame = parent;
export default {
  name: "SetNode_Blacklist",
  components:{voiceManage},
  data(){
    return{
      layParent:true,
      openerid:WFCore.GetQuery("openerid"),
      stepid:WFCore.GetQuery("id"),
      flowdata:top.wMyflowData,
      nextNodeIdList:[{value:0,text:'无'}],
      blackListGroups:[],
      selIndex:0,
      step:'',
      formItem:{
        id:'',//节点号
        name:'',//节点名称
        blackGroupId:'',//黑名单组
        inBlacklistNextNodeId:0,//黑名单跳转节点
        notInBlacklistNextNodeId:0,//非黑名单跳转节点
        sort:'',//排序序号
        describe:'',//说明
      },
      inBlacklistNextNodeIdStr:0,//黑名单跳转节点-绑定
      notInBlacklistNextNodeIdStr:0,//非黑名单跳转节点-绑定
      formItemValidate:{
        name: [{
          required: true,
          message: this.$t("pleaseEnter"),
          trigger: "blur",
        }],
        // replayCount: [{
        //   required: true,
        //   message: this.$t("pleaseEnter"),
        //   trigger: "blur",
        // }],
        // nextNodeId: [{
        //   required: true,
        //   message: this.$t("pleaseEnter"),
        //   trigger: "blur",
        // }]
      }
    }
  },
  methods:{
    init(){
      this.initData();
      this.getgetBlackListGroup();
    },
    //获取黑名单列表组
    getgetBlackListGroup(id) {
      getBlackListGroups({}).then((res) => {
        this.blackListGroups=res.result;
        this.formItem.blackGroupId=res.result[0].id;
      });
    },
    initData(){
      var than=this;
      if (frame == null) return;
      than.flowdata=top.wMyflowData;
      than.step = than.flowdata.getNode(than.stepid);
      if(than.flowdata.nodes.size()>0){
        than.flowdata.nodes.each(function (nodeId,node,index){
          if(than.step.checkNextNodeIsAllow("nextNodeId",node.id)){
            than.nextNodeIdList.push({value:node.id,text:[node.id]+'-' + node.getText()})
          }
        })
      }

      this.initStep(than.step);
    },
    initStep(step) {
      var than=this;
      if(step==null||step==undefined){
        than.formItem.name='新流程';
        return;
      }
      than.formItem.id=step.id;
      than.formItem.name=step.getText();
      than.formItem.blackGroupId=step.blackGroupId;
      than.formItem.sort=step.sort;
      than.formItem.describe=step.describe;

      //黑名单跳转节点
      than.ShowNodeResult("inBlacklistNextNodeId","#inBlacklistNextNodeId",0);
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //非黑名单跳转节点
        than.ShowNodeResult("notInBlacklistNextNodeId","#notInBlacklistNextNodeId",0);
      },50)
      //跳转节点
     // than.ShowNodeResult("nextNodeId","#base_NextNodeId",0);
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        than.formItem.nextNodeId=than.nextNodeIdStr;
      },500)
    },
    btnOk(){
      var than=this;
      var isFormValid = new RoadUI.Validate().validateForm("form1");
      if(this.formItem.replayCount > 10||this.formItem.replayCount <1)
      {
        WFCore.DialogUtils.tipDialog("重播次数在1-10之间",2,7);
        return false;
      }
      this.$refs["formItem"].validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {
          than.confirm1();
        }
      })
    },
    btnCancel(){
      new RoadUI.Window().close();
    },
    confirm1() {
      var than=this;

      var ostep={
        text:{
          text:than.formItem.name
        },
        sort:than.formItem.sort,
        describe:than.formItem.describe,
        blackGroupId:than.formItem.blackGroupId,
      }

      //this.SaveNodeResult("nextNodeId","#base_NextNodeId","跳转节点",1);
      //黑名单跳转节点
      than.ShowNodeResult("inBlacklistNextNodeId","#inBlacklistNextNodeId",0);
      //非黑名单跳转节点
      than.ShowNodeResult("notInBlacklistNextNodeId","#notInBlacklistNextNodeId",0);

      //黑名单跳转节点
      than.SaveNodeResult("inBlacklistNextNodeId","#inBlacklistNextNodeId","黑名单跳转节点",0);
      //非黑名单跳转节点
      than.SaveNodeResult("notInBlacklistNextNodeId","#notInBlacklistNextNodeId","非黑名单跳转节点",0);

      var playVoices = new parent.WFCore.List();
      var varIndex = 1;

      window.setTimeout(function (){
        than.step.restore(ostep);
        new RoadUI.Window().close();
      },500)
    },
    //给NodeResult控件赋值
    ShowNodeResult(resultName,nextNodeCtlId,isDefault){
      var than=this;
      if(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName) != null && than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId > 0)
      {
        than.formItem[resultName]=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        than.nextNodeIdStr=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        //$(nextNodeCtlId).val(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId+"");
      }
      // isDefault = isDefault != undefined && isDefault != null ? isDefault:0;
      // $(nextNodeCtlId).attr("isDefault",isDefault);
    },
    //保存NodeResult控件所选下一节点
    SaveNodeResult(resultName,nextNodeCtlId,describe,isDefault){

      var than=this;
      if(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName) != null){
        if(than.formItem.nextNodeId != null && than.formItem.nextNodeId != "")
        {
          var nodeResult = than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).restore({
            nextNodeId:isNaN(than.formItem[resultName]) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem[resultName]) || 0,
            isDefault:isDefault || 0
          });
          if(nodeResult != null) nodeResult.drawNodeResult();
        }
        else
        {
          than.step.removeNodeResult(resultName);
        }
      }
      else{
        if(than.formItem[resultName] != null && than.formItem[resultName] != "")
        {
          var nodeResult = than.step.createNodeResult({
            name:resultName,
            nextNodeId:isNaN(than.formItem[resultName]) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem[resultName]) || 0,
            isDefault:isDefault || 0,
            describe:describe
          });
          if(nodeResult != null) nodeResult.drawNodeResult();
        }
      }
    },
    //
    selVoiceListItem(i){
      this.selIndex=i;
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.init()
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="less">
.ui-combination-form{
  .ui-voiceList{
    .ui-voiceList-item{
      text-align: left;
      .ivu-form-item-label{
        border: 1px solid red !important;
      }
    }
  }

}
</style>
